description: Triangular array, read by rows: first differences in n,n direction of trinomial array A027907.
comments: The Motzkin transforms of the rows starting (1, 2), (1, 3) and (1, 4), extended by zeros after their last element, are apparently in A026134, A026109 and A026110. - _R. J. Mathar_, Dec 11 2008
maple: A025177 := proc(n,k)    option remember;    if k < 0 or k > 2*n then        0;    elif n = 0 then        1 ;    elif n = 1 then        op(k+1,[1,0,1]) ;    else        procname(n-1,k-2)+procname(n-1,k-1)+procname(n-1,k) ;    end if;end proc:seq(seq(A025177(n,k),k=0..2*n),n=0..20)  ; # _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 25 2015
